titleStmt.title: John W. Finnell, Receipt to Louisville & Frankfort and Lexington & Frankfort Railroad Companies
CWG13736

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.idno: QMG Box 10; 1863 Office Expenses - Telegraph, Stationary - Transportation - Ordinance Stores; Bundle 5

body.p:
State of Ky
No. 22.
THE UNITED STATES
To Louisville & Frankfort and Lexington & Frankfort R.R. Co.'s, Dr.
1863
DOLLARS. CENTS.
Jany 31 To Transportation of Recruits as per Vouchers
5 Men 33d Infy from Louisville to Frankfrot & return 130 miles @ 2Â¢ 260 13 00

58

1 " 44th " " " " LaGrange 17 " "
34
1 " 22d " " Milam " Frankfort 5 " "
10
$149 58

Approved
By order of the Governor
Jno. W Finnell
Adjt Genl Ky Vols.
I certify that the above account is correct and just; that the services were rendered as stated; and that they were necessary for the public service.

Received at Frankfort Ky the 23 of March 1863., of Jno W Finnell Adj. Genl. Ky Volunteers Quartermaster United States Army, the sum of One hundred and forty nine Dollars, and fifty eight Cents, in full of the above account.

No. 22.
No. 123 Abstract B P Qr. 186.
Lou & Frankfort & Lex & Frankfort R R Co
Dollars $14958/100
Paid 23 of March 1863.
